front.title: Service Discovery in On-Demand Ad Hoc Networks

abstract.t: In this document, we describe extensions to suitable ad hoc network routing protocols in order to provide support for service discovery. Typical Internet applications require information such as name resolution, a web proxy IP address, access to print services etc. While [manet] protocols have focussed on providing basic routing support for communication, this document addresses the problem of discovering services along with routes to those services.
